ONGC buys 80 percent stake  in one GSPC’s block for Rs 7,783 croreFortis Healthcare board approves to raise Rs 5,000 croreBank of Baroda introduces two-tier savings interest rateBank of India, Dena Bank allot shares to Government of India, LICJubilant Lifesciences gets ANDA approval for spasticity drug
title: Stocks To Watch: Apollo Tyres, JP Associates, Jubilant Life, ONGC
